argo.description: Argo-CD Plugin & Helm-Chart using the App-of-Apps pattern & abstraction to make GitOps deployments simple & DRY. [[see docs](https://lib42.github.io/heqet) / [My Homelab](https://github.com/nold360/hive-apps)]
Fully automated Kubernetes cluster from empty hard drives to running services with a single command (using PXE boot, k3s and ArgoCD).
